Uses of Package
boundary

Packages that use boundary
Package
Description
boundary
Contains the boundary classes that handle console interaction with users.
  • Classes in boundary used by boundary
    Class
    Description
    BaseBoundary
    Base class for console UI boundaries providing common input/output helpers and a reference to the AuthController when available.
    CareerCenterStaffBoundary
    Console boundary for Career Center staff operations.
    CompanyRepBoundary
    Boundary handling console interactions for company representatives.
    CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary
    Boundary responsible for signing up new company representatives.
    LoginBoundary
    Console boundary class handling interactive login flow for all user roles in the Internship Placement Management System.
    LoginBoundary.Role
    Enumeration representing the available user roles in the system.
    LoginBoundary.Session
    Represents an active authenticated session for a single user in the system.
    StudentBoundary
    Console boundary class for student-facing interactions in the internship management system.
